contentrichtext.text: '''Stand by Me''' may refer to: {{tocright}} ==Music== ===Songs=== * [[Stand by Me (song)|"Stand by Me" (song)]], a 1960 single by Ben E. King * "Stand by Me", a 1972 single by [[Golden Earring]] * "[[Train in Vain]]" ("Train in Vain (Stand by Me)" in the US), a 1980 single by The Clash * [[Stand by Me (Oasis song)|"Stand by Me" (Oasis song)]], a 1997 single by Oasis * [[Stand by Me (Shayne Ward song)|"Stand by Me" (Shayne Ward song)]], a 2006 single by Shayne Ward * "Stand by Me", a 2007 single by [[The Brilliant Green]] * "Stand by Me", a 2010 single by [[Prince Royce]] * "[[Dildaara (Stand by me)]]", a 2011 song from the soundtrack to ''Ra.One'' ===Albums=== * [[Stand by Me (Ernest Tubb album)|''Stand by Me'' (Ernest Tubb album)]], 1966 *''[[Stand By Me (Whatcha See Is Whatcha Get)]]'', a 1971 album by Bernard Purdie * ''[[Stand by Me: The Ultimate Collection]]'', 1987 compilation album by Ben E. King * ''Stand by Me'', a 2002 album by [[Ernie Haase & Signature Sound]] * ''Stand by Me'', a 2007 album by [[Ray Brown, Jr.]] ==Film== * [[Stand by Me (film)|''Stand by Me'' (film)]], a 1986 American drama film directed by Rob Reiner, based on the novella ''The Body'' by Stephen King ==Television== * [[Stand by Me (TV series)|''Stand by Me'' (TV series)]], a 1998 Chinese drama that aired on MediaCorp Channel 8 * "Stand by Me", a [[My Little Pony Tales#Episodes|1992 episode of]] the TV series ''My Little Pony Tales'' * "Stand by Me", a [[Grey's Anatomy (season 5)#Episodes|2009 season five episode]] of the TV series ''Grey's Anatomy'' {{disambiguation}}
